protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for prokineticin 1. Exclusively coupled to the G(q) subclass of heteromeric G proteins. Activation leads to mobilization of calcium, stimulation of phosphoinositide turnover and activation of p44/p42 mitogen-activated protein kinase

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2002 Apr 26;293(1):396-402.
